description: An organism sample of a very strange and unknown origin, as you touch it you can clearly feel how it's vibrating, moving, as if it's particles are constantly communicating with each other

An organism sample of a very strange and unknown origin, as you touch it you can clearly see how it's changing it's color, shifting from one unknown state of matter to another as if modified by an alien technology

An organism sample of a very strange and unknown origin, as you touch it you can clearly feel how it's vibrating, moving, it's particles are constantly reshaping and shifting, as if commanding each other

An organism sample of a very strange and unknown origin, as you touch it you can clearly see how it's swiftly changing it's colors, emitting vibrant rays of light, changing from one unknown state of matter to another, as if it was created by an alien technology

A well-made, seemingly handcrafted golden coin. Its one side is adorned in astounding etched decorations, and the other shows an image of a bust of some seemingly Roman Emperor with some text below it written in Latin that you cannot decipher.

A combination of well-made, seemingly handcrafted golden coins. Its one side is adorned in astounding etched decorations, and the other shows an image of a bust of some seemingly Roman Emperor with some text below it written in Latin that you cannot decipher.
A tenvamiun coin
A combination of tenvamiun coins

A well-made, seemingly handcrafted platinum coin. Its one side is adorned in astounding etched decorations, and the other shows a terribly distorted image of some chaotic deity of war or death and 3 letters under it - 'B L 9'

A combination of well-made, seemingly handcrafted platinum coins. Its one side is adorned in astounding etched decorations, and the other shows a terribly distorted image of some chaotic deity of war or death and 3 letters under it - 'B L 9'
A hylinviun coin
A combination of hylinviun coins
